data.name: AboutPriceme
data.value:
Whatever you're shopping for on the web - cameras, mobile phones, LCD monitors, or just checking out the latest new products - PriceMe allows you to compare and research products quickly and easily.

We have the Malaysia' largest and most comprehensive selection of online retailers in one place. These retailers have a combined total of more than 400 thousand products that can be purchased online!

data.name: Brandbuilding
data.value: retailer partners enjoy increased exposure by displaying their company logo for each product listing among many other benefits. Partners also have the possibility to display a sales slogan next to the logo, and are also promoted as a featured retailer on the website and in PriceMe ads. Associating your brand and products with a trusted shopping engine like PriceMe is a great way to build consumer recognition and confidence. Please contact us for all the details regarding the benefits that retailer partners enjoy.

data.name: BuyingGuides
data.value: Our buying guides are provided by {0} - a leading source of unbiased product information for savvy consumers.

data.name: CompanyInfo
data.value: PriceMe is an innovative growth company located in the Malaysia. The company provides online shopping information like price and product comparison, reviews as well as other value added services to consumers in Malaysia. The goal of the company is to empower the consumer with the information he or she needs to find the right product from a reliable retailer at the lowest price. Please contact us for any inquiries regarding the company and its business.

data.name: FindOnPriceMe
data.value: PriceMe includes and compares prices for a broad range of product categories. Most products are consumer products (TVs, cameras, home appliances etc.), but we also offer services such as broadband plans. Please refer to our site map for an overview of PriceMe's product categories. PriceMe is currently expanding our product coverage, so if you cannot find the product your interested in at the moment it's likely that you can shortly. Please Contact Us to suggest product categories that you think would be useful to consumers.

data.name: GTSInfo
data.value: All prices displayed in the Malaysia Pesos. Freight costs are estimates for Manilla.

data.name: HowToUse
data.value: PriceMe enables consumers like yourself to independently compare prices, product reviews and specifications for thousands of products from Malaysia's top retailers. After only a few minutes of browsing our site, you are already in a good position to make an informed decision about a purchase. Whatever it is you are looking for, you can quickly work out which model best meets your needs, where it is available, and at the lowest possible price from a reliable retailer. Whether you wish to purchase on or offline, PriceMe will point you to the best deal. An integral part of the decision-making is the information provided by the PriceMe community of online users. Reviews about products and retailers that you are interested in further enhance the buying decision.

data.name: InformationOnPriceMe
data.value: Absolutely. We always list the lowest price first without any bias. The reviews are written by consumers or by independent experts and product data are compiled from independent sources. PriceMe is not dependent on any manufacturer, retailer or other organization for the information provided on the website. We do have paying retailers and advertisers as clients, but this fact does not compromise our objectivity in anyway. PriceMe's prime objective is to be your independent source of shopping information in the Malaysia.

data.name: Newsletterhighlights
data.value:
• New product releases
  • Top products
  • Product reviews
  • Merchant offers
  • And other 'Smarter shopping' information...

Frequently asked questions:

data.name: PriceMeNewsletter
data.value: Find deals and bargains online in the Malaysia using PriceMe. Sign up to our newsletter and get the latest deals and offers on hot products such as mobile phones and digital cameras directly in your mail box.

data.name: RetailerCenter
data.value: List your products now on the Malaysia' fastest growing comparison shopping website. Getting your products listed is easy!

data.name: RetailerFAQsWhatIsPriceMe
data.value: PriceMe is a rapidly growing online comparison shopping website in the Malaysia. Our goal is to bring qualified buyers who are looking for products to buy and match them up with our retailer partners who sell those products. For retailer partners, PriceMe is a pay-for-performance comparison shopping engine. We provide comprehensive price and product comparison and a clean, uncluttered interface which allows consumers to do what they came to do: compare and buy.

data.name: RetailerListOnPriceMe
data.value: PriceMe currently lists retailers that offer online shopping, i.e. have a website that you can purchase from, and are deemed reputable with competitively priced products. Retailers are listed regardless of whether it's a paying client or not in order to give consumers an independent view. All the retailers listed on PriceMe fullfill the requirements for online shops as specified by The Ministry of Consumer Affairs' advice for Internet traders. Retailers that receive a large amount of complaints or that don't meet the requirements outlined by Ministry of Consumer Affairs will be delisted.

data.name: RetailersList
data.value: Welcome to PriceMe's Retailer List - the location for the leading shops in the Malaysia.

data.name: RetailerStoreInfoList
data.value:
Store information and prices are provided by the retailers and PriceMe assumes no responsibility for accuracy of this information. Product specifications are obtained from retailers or third parties and although we make every effort to present accurate information, PriceMe is not responsible for any errors or discrepancies. Please confirm prices and specs before buying online.

Store ratings and retailer reviews are written and submitted by online consumers in Malaysia and overseas. These reviews do not reflect our opinions and we take no responsibility for the content of ratings and reviews submitted by users.

PriceMe is shopping comparison website for online shoppers in Malaysia, and helps you find the best deals, bargains and discounts by comparing products and prices from the best shops in MY and abroad. Buy online and save by shopping on PriceMe. You find online shops and retailers that deliver to Malaysia on PriceMe.

data.name: TrafficPriceMe
data.value: You can check out the amount of visitors using PAM. The management team at PriceMe has years of experiencing in acquiring traffic though partnerships with major websites, paid and natural search, and through new products. Hence, expect the traffic levels to increase the coming months as we keep promoting the website and acquiring high-quality traffic. In addition, comparison shopping is also gaining traction and more and more consumers are likely to use this kind of shopping services in the near future.

data.name: WhatIsPriceMe
data.value: PriceMe is a price comparison engine in the Malaysia. Browse thousands of products available online, compare prices and buy from Malaysia online stores.
